message_content: Hello, I need help with my order #12345. I received it yesterday but one item is damaged.
I'm sorry to hear that. Can you describe the damage to the item?
The packaging is torn and the product has scratches on the surface.
Thank you for that information. I apologize for the inconvenience. Would you like a replacement or a refund for this item?
I'd prefer a refund please. When can I expect to receive it?
I'll process the refund right away. It should appear in your account within 3-5 business days. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
Will I receive an email confirmation for the refund?
Yes, you'll receive an email confirmation within the next hour. The email will include details about the refund amount and processing time.
Great, thank you for your help!
You're welcome! If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again. Have a great day!
